scripts.pkg:name: cat package.json | grep '"name":' | cut -d '"' -f4
scripts.git:commit: npm run build && git add . && read -p 'Commit: ' c; c=${c:-v$(npm run -s pkg:version)} && n=$(npm run -s pkg:name) && git commit -am "$n: $c"
scripts.commit: read -p 'Version [patch]: ' v; v=${v:-patch} && npm version --force --no-git-tag-version $v; echo $v && read -p 'Publish? (y/N): ' p && case $p in Y|y) $(npm run -s git:set:tag);; esac && npm run -s git:commit && case $p in Y|y) $(git push && git push --tags && npm run publish);; esac
